titlePart.text: Curling-tongs, i.e. tongs for use when hot
Curling-irons, i.e. irons for use when hot
with means for internal heating, e.g. by liquid fuel
the jaws remaining parallel to each other during use, e.g. the jaws sliding parallel to each other
the jaws being separable from each other
External heating means for curling-tongs or curling-irons
with temperature regulating or indicating means
Hair winders or hair curlers for use substantially perpendicular to the scalp

titlePart.entryReference: with incorporated heating or drying means
heating devices designed for use external to and in connection with, hair curlers or hair wavers

titlePart.text: in the form of rods with jaw devices
in the form of rods with base plate or base clamp
in the form of spools or bobbins
Hair winders or hair curlers for use parallel to the scalp, i.e. flat-curlers
titlePart.entryReference: heating devices designed for use external to, and in connection with, hair curlers or hair winders

titlePart.text: of single-piece type, e.g. stiff rods or tubes with or without cord, band, or the like as hair-fastening means
in the form of forked rods or tubes
with means for applying liquids therethrough
of multi-part type, e.g. with sliding parts other than for fastening
with clamping bow as fastening means
with positive non-return means, e.g. ratchet
Hair curlers or hair winders with incorporated heating or drying means, e.g. electric, using chemical reaction
Clamps or clasps with teeth or combs
using two or more combs one upon the other or one in distance to the other, e.g. using slidable combs
Like means for the care of the beard
Separate devices designed for heating hair curlers or hair-wavers
titlePart.entryReference: hair-drying devices without connection to hair curlers or hair-wavers

titlePart.text: for steep curling, e.g. with means for decreasing the heat
heated by steam or hot air
for flat curling, e.g. with means for decreasing the heat
heated by steam or hot air
with chemical heat reaction and heat storage
Independent devices characterised by heating the hair-curling or hair-waving means before use
Supports or suspending means for devices heating hair-curling or hair-waving means while in use
Details of or accessories for hair-curling or hair-waving devices
Devices for winding the hair upon steep-curlers
Devices for winding the hair on flat-curlers
Devices for pneumatic waving in form boxes
Protecting devices or packages for hair curlers or the like while in use
Processes of waving, straightening or curling hair
titlePart.entryReference: preparations for waving or straightening the hair

titlePart.text: two-limbed, e.g. shaped as a U
Hair grips, i.e. elastic single-piece two-limbed grips
Hair clamps, i.e. elastic multi-part clamps the parts of which are pivotally connected between their ends
Hair clasps, i.e. multi-part clasps with pivotal connection of parts at their ends
Cleaning the hair or the scalp
Devices for washing the hair or the scalp
Similar devices for colouring the hair
Hand-actuated implements, e.g. hand-actuated spray heads
in the form of bowls or similar open containers
Closed washing devices, e.g. washing caps
Surface treatment of hair by steam, oil, or the like
Lay frames for long open hair
Hand-held drying devices, e.g. air douches
Details therof or accessories therefor, e.g. nozzles, stands
Flexible caps with provision for hot air supply
Helmets without hot air supply or other ventilation, e.g. electrically heated
Helmets with installed ventilating and heating means
Shape or structure of the helmet body
Drying the air by incorporated heating elements
Electric circuitry specially adapted for hair drying devices
titlePart.entryReference: electric circuits in general, see the relevant classes of Section H

titlePart.text: Supporting or fastening of the helmets
Arrangement of the electric heating means
Additional devices or measures, e.g. for noise damping, for musical entertainment
Hair-drying helmets whereon the ventilating means and the heating means are apart from the helmet
provided with tubes for exhausting the hot air
Hair-drying combs or hair-drying brushes, with internal heating means
and provision for an air stream
Hair-drying combs or hair-drying brushes, adapted for heating by an external heating source
Hair combs for care of the hair

titlePart.entryReference: hair-trimming devices, using a razor blade, integral or combined with combs , e.g.

titlePart.text: with handle designed to be attached to the hand of the user
with brushes, pads, or the like whereon the additional devices are operable without more ado
the additional devices being only operable when the comb-part is in a non-operable position
the additional devices being nail cleaners or nail files
Combs with dispensing devices for liquids, pastes or powders
with flexible walls of the liquid, paste, or powder storing device
Combs specially adapted for removing dirt or grease
Combs, stencils, or guides, specially adapted for hair trimming devices
detachable from, or fixed to, the comb
Apparatus for removing superfluous hair, e.g. tweezers
Hand implement for lathering, e.g. using brush
Lather-producing devices operated by compressed air or by swirling water
Containers or carriers for storing shaving appliances
for storing razor blades, e.g. after use
titlePart.entryReference: packaging containers , e.g. for dispensing razor-blades

titlePart.text: for styptic pencils, styptic cotton-wool or the like
for storing one shaving appliance within another
titlePart.entryReference: means integral with, or attached to, the razor for storing shaving cream, styptic, or the like
masks for marking lips or eyelashes
ear, face or lip protectors for other toilet or cosmetic purposes

titlePart.text: Devices specially adapted for cleaning or disinfecting shavers or razors

titlePart.entryReference: hand cutting tools with two jaws which come into abutting contact

titlePart.text: Manicure or pedicure sets, e.g. combinations without case, etui, or the like
titlePart.entryReference: combined with or on sheath of scissors ,

titlePart.text: Boxes, cases, etuis or the like specially adapted therefor
titlePart.entryReference: receptacles for travelling or like purposes

titlePart.text: Containers or accessories specially adapted for handling toilet or cosmetic substances
titlePart.entryReference: for applying therapeutic or disinfecting substances , e.g.
spraying or atomising in general, applying liquids or other fluent materials to surfaces in general
containers in general , e.g. for dispensing powdered or granular material

titlePart.text: Containers or accessories specially adapted for handling toilet or cosmetic powder
with dispensing means, e.g. sprinkling means
with closures in form of iris diaphragms
with openings in the lid, able to be opened or closed by displacing or rotating a covering part
with special decorative arrangements or form
Containers with lids or covers at the top and the bottom
Containers with two lids on one side
with lipstick holders or with other toilet articles
with watches or other mechanically-driven articles
Papers containing powder or other toilet substances
Containers or accessories specially adapted for handling liquid toilet or cosmetic substances, e.g. perfumes
Appliances specially adapted for applying liquid, e.g. using roller or ball
in combination with other toilet articles, e.g. lipstick
Casings or accessories for storing or handling solid or pasty toilet or cosmetic substances, e.g. shaving soap, lipstick, make-up
titlePart.entryReference: features common to containers for handling powdery or liquid toilet or cosmetic substances
features common to writing or drawing appliances

titlePart.text: Casings wherein movement of the lipstick or like solid is a sliding movement
Casings wherein movement of the lipstick or like solid is a screwing movement
with provision for sieves or shaping parts for stick ends
Casings wherein a spring presses the lipstick or like solid into the position for use or into the retracted position
Casings with provision for preventing undesired movement of the stick
Casings with ejector for waste stick or the like
Simple holders for handling stick-shaped cosmetics or shaving soap while in use
Casings characterised by a hinged cover
Casings for two or more cosmetics
Appliances specially adapted for applying pasty paint, e.g. using roller, using a ball
Appliances specially adapted for spreading already applied paint
Masks for marking lips or eyelashes
Mirrors with means for attaching to fingers
able to be suspended on a person's body
with other suspending or supporting means
Other toilet or cosmetic equipment, e.g. for hairdressers' rooms
Furniture or other equipment specially adapted for hairdressers' rooms and not covered elsewhere
Special adaptations of portable frames or racks
Means specially adapted for suspending hairdressers' machines, e.g. trolleys for electro-motors

titlePart.entryReference: wearing apparel in general , e.g. hairdressers' coats

titlePart.text: Hair-collecting boxes or containers for the same purpose
Receptacles for hair brushes or tooth brushes as travelling equipment
Face shaping devices, e.g. chin straps
Wrinkle removers, e.g. stretching the skin
